description:
Insight Global is seeking a highly qualified Sales Training Manager focused in the home appliance on consumer electronics industry to join our team. The successful candidate will play a crucial role in executing training strategies for our internal sales team, our external dealer partners, and their retail sales associates. This position will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams, developing training programs, and fostering a culture of continuous learning.

As a Sales Training Manager, you will play a crucial role in developing and implementing effective training programs to equip our sales team with the knowledge and skills needed to excel in selling our diverse range of appliances. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including sales, marketing, and product development, to ensure that our sales professionals, our dealers, and their retail sales associates are well-prepared to meet customer needs and exceed sales targets.

Duties and Responsibilities:
• Lead training initiatives that focus on the home appliance brand, new product launches, product knowledge, selling skills, and sustainability.
• Continuously update training materials to stay current with industry trends, product innovations, and best practices. Keep up with advancements in training technologies and methodologies.
• Incorporate e-learning platforms and other technologies for enhanced training efficiency and effectiveness.
• Oversee specific training programs. Ensure high-quality delivery and engagement in all training programs.
• Facilitate engaging and interactive training sessions, incorporating role-playing and real-life scenarios to enhance practical skills
• Ensure sales representatives have a deep understanding of our product line, features, and benefits.
• Stay informed about industry trends and product advancements to incorporate relevant information into training programs.

Required Skills & Experience

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Business or related field. Master's degree is a plus.
• Minimum of 5 years of proven experience in a training role, preferably within the home appliances or consumer electronics industry.
• Familiarity with learning management systems and e-learning platforms
• Excellent communication and presentation skills.
• Demonstrated ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and adapt to a fast-paced, dynamic environment.

Benefit packages for this role will start on the 31st day of employment and include medical, dental, and vision insurance, as well as HSA, FSA, and DCFSA account options, and 401k retirement account access with employer matching. Employees in this role are also entitled to paid sick leave and/or other paid time off as provided by applicable law.
